mapper.select: select s.protocol, s.identifier, n.uuid, np.string_value as name from alf_node n join alf_store s on (s.id = n.store_id) join alf_node_properties np on (np.node_id = n.id) where n.type_qname_id = #{typeQNameId} and np.qname_id = #{propQNameId} and np.string_value like #{namePattern}
select count(*) from alf_node_aspects na where na.qname_id in #{item}
select count(*) from alf_node n where n.type_qname_id = #{idOne}
mapper.update: update alf_content_data set content_mimetype_id = ? where content_mimetype_id = ?
update alf_node_properties set actual_type_n = 3, persisted_type_n = 3 where qname_id = #{sizeCurrentQNameId} AND (actual_type_n = 0 OR persisted_type_n = 0)
